128.1.6.5/12  
convertiamo in binario
10000000.00000001.00000110.00000101
subnet mask
11111111.11110000.00000000.00000000 => 255.240.0.0
rete
10000000.00000000.00000000.00000000 => 128.0.0.0
broadcast
10000000.00001111.11111111.11111111 => 128.15.255.255
numero host massimo
2^20 - 2 = 1048574
gateway 1: 10000000.00000000.00000000.00000001 => 128.0.0.1
gateway 2: 10000000.00001111.11111111.11111110 => 128.15.255.254
